main.prg2: Renting an electric car from bestelectric is easy and convenient. Simply reserve your car online or by phone, and we'll deliver it to you right where you need it. We also offer a variety of rental options to fit your needs, including:
main.prg3: At Bestelectric, we believe in creating a brighter future for everyone. We understand that saving money and caring for the planet are two important concerns for many people. That's why we offer a range of sustainable solutions that help you achieve both goals.
main.prg4: Imagine a family living in a cozy home powered by the sun. Thanks to our efficient solar panel installation, they've significantly reduced their electricity bills and gained independence from the grid. Their journey with bestelectric not only saved them money but also contributed to a cleaner environment for their children and future generations.
main.prg5: This is just one example of how we empower individuals and communities to embrace sustainability. We've helped countless businesses transition to clean energy sources, reducing their carbon footprint and improving their energy efficiency.

products.prg1: Drive clean, live green. Our lineup offers a complete solution for the eco-conscious driver.  Behind the wheel of one of our electric cars, experience the smooth ride and zero emissions.  When it's time to recharge, power up conveniently at one of our charging stations, or take charge at home with our easy-to-install solar panels. We even offer wind turbines to generate your own clean energy, making your drive truly sustainable.
products.prg2: Experience the thrill of electric driving with our electric car rental fleet!  Whether you're looking for a short trip around town or a longer eco-adventure, we have the perfect electric vehicle to fit your needs.
products.prg3: Experience the thrill of electric driving with our electric car rental fleet!  Whether you're looking for a short trip around town or a longer eco-adventure, we have the perfect electric vehicle to fit your needs.

products.question2: How often will I need to charge?
products.answer5: The answer to the question "Are electric cars safe for passengers?" - positive. They are no less safe than regular cars, and according to some experts, even safer. This is because the battery, which is large and heavy, is usually integrated into the floor, providing additional body rigidity and better occupant protection in the event of an accident. Crash tests on the Euro NCAP website confirm that all electric vehicles tested received the maximum 5 stars safety rating. Some people worry about the possibility of spontaneous combustion of lithium-ion batteries in electric cars, citing cases of similar incidents with laptops and mobile phones. However, automakers take a wide range of measures to prevent such situations, including the use of heavy-duty steel casings for batteries, separating them into individual cells (to prevent the spread of fire), and multiple fuses, switches and cooling systems. In fact, research shows that electric cars, which do not use flammable fuels, are much less likely to catch fire than conventional cars.

aboutUs.prg1: At Best electric, we've been shaping the sustainable future for the past two decades. With an unwavering commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, we've established ourselves as a leading provider of electric vehicles, charging stations, solar panels, and wind turbines.
aboutUs.mission1: To empower individuals and businesses to adopt sustainable practices seamlessly
aboutUs.mission2: To democratize access to clean energy solutions, making them accessible to all
aboutUs.mission3: To foster a culture of innovation and continuous improvement, driving the development of sustainable technologies
aboutUs.prg2: Despite the challenges and complexities of operating in a dynamic market, we remain steadfast in our optimism for the future. We believe that innovation, collaboration, and a commitment to sustainability hold the key to a brighter, more harmonious world.
aboutUs.prg3: Make your contribution to a cleaner future - switch to electric power!

service.underHeader1: Energy-Efficient Solutions for Your Home and Business
service.prg11: Do you want to reduce your energy bills and shrink your carbon footprint? Solar panel installation is a great solution! Solar panels convert sunlight into clean electricity that powers your home, saving you money on energy bills.

service.miniHeader12: Here are some benefits of installing solar panels:
service.miniHeader13: We offer professional solar panel installation, which includes:
service.dotted11: Lower energy bills: Solar panels generate electricity for your home, reducing your reliance on the grid and lowering your monthly expenses.
service.dotted12: Environmental benefits: Solar energy is a renewable source of energy that doesn't pollute the environment, helping to combat climate change.
service.dotted13: Increased property value: Homes with solar panels become more at
service.dotted14: Lower energy bills: Solar panels generate electricity for your home, reducing your reliance on the grid and lowering your monthly expenses.
service.dotted15: Environmental benefits: Solar energy is a renewable source of energy that doesn't pollute the environment, helping to combat climate change.
service.dotted16: Increased property value: Homes with solar panels become more attractive to buyers, potentially increasing the value of your property.

service.underHeader2: Energy-Efficient Solutions for Your Home and Business
service.prg21: Do you own an electric vehicle? You need a convenient and reliable charging solution. Installing an electric vehicle charger at home or work is a simple and effective way to always have access to power.
service.miniHeader21: Here are some benefits of installing an electric vehicle charger:
service.miniHeader22: We offer professional installation of electric vehicle chargers, which includes:
service.miniHeader23: Here are some additional benefits of installing an electric vehicle charger:
service.dotted21: Convenience: Charge your electric vehicle at home or work, without wasting time looking for public charging stations.
service.dotted22: Save time: Electric vehicle chargers provide faster charging than regular power outlets.
service.dotted23: Save money: Charging at home or work can be cheaper than using public charging stations.
service.dotted24: Be environmentally friendly: Electric vehicles are a more environmentally friendly form of transportation than gasoline or diesel-powered vehicles.
service.dotted25: Free consultation: Our specialists will help you choose the right charger for your electric vehicle and your home.
service.dotted26: High-quality equipment: We use only reliable and certified chargers.
service.dotted27: Professional installation: Our qualified installers will quickly and neatly install your charger.
service.dotted28: Increased property value: Homes with EV chargers are becoming more attractive to buyers, potentially increasing the value of your property.
service.dotted29: Reduced reliance on fossil fuels: By charging your EV at home, you can reduce your reliance on fossil fuels and help to reduce your carbon footprint.
service.dotted30: Government incentives: Many governments offer incentives to encourage the installation of EV chargers, such as tax credits or rebates.
service.prg22: If you're considering installing an electric vehicle charger, contact us today to learn more about our services and how we can help you make the switch to electric driving.
service.prg23: Ready to take a step into the electric vehicle future? Contact us today to learn more about electric vehicle charger installation!

article.header: How to select a proper solar panel?
article.prg1: Solar panels are a fantastic way to tap into renewable energy and power your home. But with so many options available, selecting the perfect panel can feel overwhelming. Fear not, future solar-powered citizen! This guide will illuminate the key factors to consider when choosing a solar panel for your needs.
article.prg2: Efficiency is King: Solar panel efficiency refers to the percentage of sunlight converted into electricity. Higher efficiency panels generate more power per square foot, allowing you to potentially use fewer panels to meet your energy needs. This can be especially crucial if your roof space is limited.
article.prg3: Location, Location, Location: Sunshine hours significantly impact panel output. Research average sunlight hours in your area to estimate potential energy generation. Shade also plays a role. Factor in nearby trees or buildings that might cast shadows on your panels throughout the day.
